title: Who is responsible for cleaning up the litter that accumulates along route 17,74-76 west of the Cape Fear River.  On the weekend of the tri-athelon we happened to travel this stretch of highway and were embarrassed for the city to have all of the tri-athelon visitors greeted with all this trash.  This stretch of highway always seems to be an eyesore.
text:
Here's a link to a previous post at MyReporter.com that should
answer your question: http://www.myreporter.com/?p=4003
